channel.title: Screen blacks out
channel.description:
I'm at the bit with the tram, I've killed the little bullpup aliens and i get off the tram before it crashes.
But as I go forward the screen goes entirely black. Flashlight doesn't work but when I shoot I see a red light.
Anyone else had this issue?

item.title: Screen blacks out
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
Could you please try the possible workaround posted here:
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?p=502093#post502093

Report back to that thread if it works for you. Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Screen blacks out
item.dc:creator: instinx
item.description:
enable High Dynamic range in advanced video options.

Read full topic
